concept.title: Assignment Roles for Subscriptions
concept.abstract: Assignment Roles control access to important functions related viewing and modifying subscriptions in the Community Portal.

conbody.p:
The Assignment Roles related list on an Item Class record, with the Is Subscription checkbox enabled, allows Admin users to manually configure assignments:
Receives Email Communications-Check the Receives Email Communications checkbox to allow the customer to receive emails related to renewal notices, subscription logs, subscription amendments, and any other Admin modifications to their subscription.
Is Primary-When a customer is assigned to a subscription with Is Primary checked, the customer can modify their subscription in the Community Portal.
Is Default-When an Assignment Role is not selected, the customer is auto-assigned a Default role that will allow the assignee to view their subscription in the Community Portal.
Is Active-The Is Active checkbox must be enabled in order for the items related to the subscription based Item Class to display in the Community Portal.

At a minimum, a subscription based Item Class must have at least one Assignment Role with the Is Default and Is Active checkboxes enabled. If the Assignment is not the same as the Contact on the Sales Order, users must navigate to the Sales Order record to identify the Contact purchasing the subscription. All Assignments can view the subscriptions that are assigned to them. In order to allow the customer full access to subscription management in the Community Portal, enable Receives Email Communications, Is Primary, and Is Active.
